I run on Windows XP regularly without problems.

Are you sure the 503 is coming from Heritrix, and not another server on 
the same machine?

What exact URL are you trying and what are the full contents of the 
error page returned?

Also, keep in mind that we recommend anyone starting out with Heritrix 
begin with Heritrix 1.14.3, not 2.0.

- Gordon @ IA

willisjohnson@... wrote:
> Newby question:
> 
> I've installed Heritrix 2.0 on Windows Server R2. It seems to be running, but I can't access the browser-based admin interface. I get a 503 error when I connect to localhost:8080. I tried specifying a different port, but got the same error.
> 
> Is anybody running 2.0 on Windows?
> 
> thanks.
> Willis Johnson
> Santa Monica, CA
